english.segment1: Life is short, it seems. Quick it comes how quick it leaves. We search for life in passing things
english.segment2: I see bits of you in me. I've got something you should see. I am poor in most everything. But I will get a crown of Kings
english.segment3: I don't know where you'll be. I hope it's with me in the sky. Looking down way below. Waving Goodbye
english.segment4: I watch the time with you pass. I wish so much that it would last. But if the thief comes here tonight. I hope to see you on the other side
